CustomField.description: The system automatically populates this optional picklist field to indicate the address type used to determine the census tract. By default, it is empty.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select a value to indicate the address type used to determine the census tract.
CustomField.label: Census Tract Address Type

value.label: 1 - Address or location where the loan proceeds will principally be applied
2 - Address or location of borrower's main office or headquarters
3 - Another address or location associated with the applicant
988 - Not provided by applicant and otherwise undetermined
